Module imagingbook.plugins_book
Package Ch03_Point_Operations

Class Gamma_Correction

java.lang.Object
Ch03_Point_Operations.Gamma_Correction
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlugInFilter
public class Gamma_Correction extends Object implements PlugInFilter

This ImageJ performs simple gamma correction (with fixed γ = 2.8) on a 8-bit grayscale image, which is modified. See Sec. 3.7 (Prog. 3.4) of [1] for additional details.

[1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, Digital Image Processing – An Algorithmic Introduction, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
